page.title: 05DUNHAM MASSEY Oct._Apr.cont
page.content: are usually made of wood and so each cover has to be very big so it does not rip any of the furniture. There are colour codes for most things in the house so they know what came from a particular room. In the house there is a lot of oak pannelling.This has to be cleaned also with old fashioned beeswax polish with the old fashioned way of doing it and the cleaners use hoovers very rarely on carpets as this can ruin the very old ones after a while. For cleaning the curtains a wire mesh is put over them to stop the hoover damaging the material.
